member.name: T:DotNet.SystemCollections.Analyzers.Helpers.AnalyzerCategory
member.summary: This is the listing of analyzer categories.

member.name: F:DotNet.SystemCollections.Analyzers.Helpers.AnalyzerCategory.Arrays
member.summary: This category is for those analyzers operating on arrays.

member.name: F:DotNet.SystemCollections.Analyzers.Helpers.AnalyzerCategory.Collections
member.summary: This category is for those analyzers operating on (Generic) collections (i.e. those from System.Collections.Generic).

member.name: F:DotNet.SystemCollections.Analyzers.Helpers.AnalyzerCategory.OldStyleCollections
member.summary: This category is focused for those analyzers operating on "Old-Style" collections (i.e. those from System.Collections).

member.name: F:DotNet.SystemCollections.Analyzers.Helpers.AnalyzerHelper.AnalyzerIdMinimumNumberOfDigits
member.summary: This is the minimum number of digits in the ID number portion of the analyzer ID; if less than the specified number is provided, zero padding will occur.

member.summary: This is used to ensure uniqueness amongst analyzer IDs.

member.name: M:DotNet.SystemCollections.Analyzers.Helpers.AnalyzerHelper.GetCompleteAnalyzerId(System.Int32)
member.summary: This is used to return the complete analyzer ID, given the .
member.param: The ID number of the specific PDK analyzer.
member.returns: This returns the complete ID for the PDK analyzer with the given .
member.exception: This will be thrown if: 1) The given is less than or equal to zero. 2) The given has already been used.
